name: SuperAwesomeRoboDojo
description:
Prototype for a Robot Combat Game I was Working on a while back.

Currently not actively working on this but thought I'd upload this Free Demo so at least people can have a go at what I made, if you like it please feel free to donate, lack of funds is the main reason projects like this get abandoned at the moment while I'm between jobs.

-Multiple Playable robots
-Spinners, Flippers, Axe Bot and Lifters
-Arena Hazards (Flipper, Flame Pits, Spikes and Pit of Oblivion)
-Basic AI
-Local Multiplayer (P1 Controller P2 Keyboard)
-Randomly Generated Arena Hazard Location and Amounts
-Ring Outs, Immobilisation Countdown and Damage KO's
-Basic Destruction (Weapons, Wheels can be Damaged to Failure and come off)
-Dynamic Camera Angles to Simulate the TV Show
-Cameras Models actually Track the Action
